text:
Tech in Asia (YC W15) • https://www.techinasia.com/ • QA, Product, Business roles • ONSITE • Singapore, Shanghai

Founded in 2011, Tech in Asia's mission is to make the tech industry in Asia more connected and vibrant. People use Tech in Asia to read the latest industry news, find jobs, recruit talent and connect with startups, investors and corporates.

Apply here: http://bit.ly/2ar8ks6 :)
